# Cognitive Concerns History (Nonâ€‘Validated)

## Presenting Concerns

- Primary complaint (memory, attention, executive function, language)
- Onset and progression
- Impact on daily functioning

## Medical and Psychiatric Factors

- Mood symptoms (depression/anxiety)
- Substance use
- Sleep problems
- Neurologic history (stroke, TBI, seizures)

## Medications and Safety

- Current medications
- Falls or driving concerns
- Support system

## Summary Prompt

- Summarize cognitive concerns and next steps.
